name: report_id
description: Unique ID for the generated report

name: report_type
description: Type of report (e.g., Executive Summary, Sector Analysis)

name: company_ticker
description: Stock ticker if the report is company-specific

name: generation_timestamp
description: Timestamp when the report was generated

name: gcs_uri
description: Cloud Storage URI where the full report text is stored

name: llm_model_used
description: Vertex AI LLM model used for generation

name: parameters_used
description: JSON string of key parameters/inputs for report generation

name: status
description: Status of report generation (e.g., COMPLETED, FAILED)

name: embedding_id
description: Reference ID to the embedding of the report summary in Vector Search
